ad_text: Nelson Brothers Trucking Sponsored Truck Drivers. Want to be home every night and weekend? If you have a CDL and live near Springfield-Eugene Oregon area we have several local hourly-paid Log Truck Driver positions open that will get you home daily. The Nelson Family offers competitive pay and benefits that includes medical, dental, vision, HSA, 401(K) retirement plans with company match and a generous PTO program. So what are you waiting for? Give us a call at (541)746-0075 or email HR@NBTrucking.com for more info! The Nelson Family businesses are Equal Opportunity Employers.
